message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. It's a steal, if I do say so myself!
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate a price below $850000?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $875000. It's a great compromise, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I believe we can reach an even better agreement. Could you consider offering the product at $860000? This would be more in line with my budget.
I'm getting close to your target, Bob! I can offer you the product for $880000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget. I would like to propose a price of $870000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I can offer you the product for $900000. It's the best I can do, and I think you'll be happy with it!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $885000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
